comment: * Struct-like class used to return information for constructing a UI list, each corresponding to a locale.

variables.name: minimized
variables.comment: * Returns the minimized locale for an input locale, such as sr-Cyrl → sr

variables.name: modified
variables.comment: * Returns the modified locale for an input locale, such as sr → sr-Cyrl, where there is also an sr-Latn in the list

variables.name: nameInDisplayLocale
variables.comment: * Returns the name of the modified locale in the display locale, such as "Englisch (VS)" (for 'en-US', where the display locale is 'de').

variables.name: nameInSelf
variables.comment: * Returns the name of the modified locale in itself, such as "English (US)" (for 'en-US').

methods.name: public static Comparator<UiListItem> getComparator(Comparator<Object> comparator, boolean inSelf)
methods.comment:
* Return a comparator that compares the locale names for the display locale or the in-self names,
         * depending on an input parameter.
         * @param inSelf if true, compares the nameInSelf, otherwise the nameInDisplayLocale
         * @param comparator (meant for strings, but because Java Collator doesn't have <String>...)
         * @return UiListItem comparator

methodNames: public static Comparator<UiListItem> getComparator(Comparator<Object> comparator, boolean inSelf)
